overview: Ross Noble, Northumberland's number one stand-up, performs more surreal flights of fantasy in his 2011 live shows.  However, there is a quirk to 'Headspace Cowboy': there's no one central show on offer.  Rather, you have a 'bumper selection pack' of equal size chunks, from different gigs, each one lasting about 40-50 minutes.
title: Ross Noble: The Headspace Cowboy
